extendedInfo.description: Deltek Touch Time for VisionDeltek, Inc. Entering timesheet data is never fun, but itâs now easier than ever to enter time into Deltek Vision. Touch Time for Deltek Vision provides Vision users anytime, anywhere access to submit and track time and units for project based activities with mobile access directly from Android device - saving time and increasing accuracy and efficiency. Same great timekeeping features as in Deltek Vision, and ideal for users who travel or are away from the office. Features* Ability to enter project information, project phase, task, labor codes, labor category values and labor comments * Quickly access favorite or recent projects allowing efficient time entry * Input any combination of regular hours and overtime hours for each day in a labor period* Enter Units for each day in a labor period* Validate timesheet entries against project budgets and expected hours* Easy and secure access to the app using a 4-digit pin Touch Time for Deltek Vision is free and is supported on Android version 2.3 or higher (version 3.x is not supported).  Your organizationâs instance of Vision must be updated to at least Vision 7.0 SP1 with the latest hotfix and needs to be accessible via the internet.  This version of Touch Time is not supported on Vision 6.2 SP2 or earlier.Deltek Touch Time for Vision utilizes a server-side component that must be installed on your Vision application server. Contact your IT department to ensure this component is in place and up to date prior to utilizing this mobile app.For more information and details on system requirements and known issues, please see KB article #71390 on Deltekâs customer care web site, https://deltek.custhelp.com. To use Touch Time for Deltek Vision, a Vision user license is required. For more information please visit us at www.deltek.com.

reviews.title: Won\'t let me log in
reviews.comment: Tried various combinations but it will not connect to our company URL. Just hangs at the main screen.
reviews.author: Ryan Umentum

reviews.title: Needs work
reviews.comment: How about a Close button? The only way to exit the app is to go to my home screen and kill the app through an app killer. Also, an upfront warning on updates to make sure that users have the current software version account before updating would be nice. Otherwise, this app works well when my crews are on the road to keep current time sheets even when working 16 hour days.
reviews.author: Matt Waldenmeyer

reviews.title: Connection Problem
reviews.comment: I have tried a multitude of different option to try and get this app going, and each has failed. I would really like to have this app working. It doesn\'t give me any kind of error message, it will just show a loading screen for a second and than just stop. not crash, just not do anything further. PLEASE FIX!
reviews.author: Shawn Ford

reviews.title: Does not work.
reviews.comment: Would like it if they would make it work.
reviews.author: steven peterson

reviews.comment: Total crap
reviews.author: Denis Jackowski

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: \'Log out\' and \'Forget me on this device\' are located too close together.   Love being able to use a PIN to submit my timesheet rather than my regular network password.
reviews.author: J Spencer

reviews.title: Good overall
reviews.comment: Wish that it allows you to show the amount of sick time and vacation hours available for use.
reviews.author: Beltran Cahapay

reviews.title: Terrible
reviews.comment: Unusable in current state.
reviews.author: Richard Blalock

reviews.title: Take Another Look
reviews.comment: App works exceptionally well on Verizon Droid 4 Jellybean. Setup as a breeze and past navigation issues are resolved. We have several users in the field on different devices running the app on Vision 7 SP1 though VPN. Time sheets are submitted on time and users have no complaints thus far. \302\240To quote one of our past late time sheet offenders\342\200\246 \342\200\234This is AWESOME!!!!\342\200\235
reviews.author: Angela Speeth

reviews.title: Work on nexus 4 now
reviews.comment: Doesn\'t hangs at launch screen any more works as advertised great app.
reviews.author: Justin Lattierre

reviews.title: Fuggedaboudit
reviews.comment: Won\'t even connect (https, Vision 7, Razr Maxx). Doesn\'t save the connect string. No options or diagnostic info. Total rubbish.
reviews.author: Steven Duff

reviews.title: Works fine
reviews.comment: I have a Samsung Galaxy Note II running Android 4.1.1 and it works fine for me. It does not know how to handle a self-signed SSL certificate. But our testing with HTTP works just fine. Not sure why folks say it does not support the latest version of Android OS. Perhaps it is the new flavor of Jelly Bean - 4.2?
reviews.author: Thomas Iannelli

reviews.title: App runs but not well
reviews.comment: Razr Maxx - application works to log in and do things but the interface is extremely sluggish. Any sort of animation is very lagged and glitchy. Must push certain buttons multiple times to proceed.
reviews.author: Jay Grimes

reviews.title: Hangs on loading screen.
reviews.comment: Seems to hang on startup/loading screen. I am on a Nexus 7 with Android 4.2.1
reviews.author: Michael Kastanotis

reviews.title: Three dots doesn\'t do it.
reviews.comment: When starting the application it hangs on a screen with three dots flashing over and over. As another reviewer stated I am also running 4.2.1 on my Galaxy Nexus. This will be very usefull when traveling if it ever gets fixed. Sense I did not get to try it out I will give 1 star which will be changed later if it does get fixed.
reviews.author: Mark Hebert

reviews.comment: Dosen\'t support most recent version of android
reviews.author: Philip Patterson

reviews.title: Terrible
reviews.comment: Won\'t load.
reviews.author: Damien Anderson

reviews.title: Bigger waste of time than desktop
reviews.comment: Deltek produces the most tedious time management product available. Now the mobile brings the inconvenience to your smartphone. I had to put ALL login information every time I tried to use the app. Deleted after three uses. Or attempts to use. Do yourself a favor, talk your employer into using something else. Anything else.
reviews.author: Tim Krueger

reviews.title: Won\'t Open
reviews.comment: The app will not allow me to enter the Server URL upon initial setup. Will wait for update, until then 1 star.
reviews.author: Nick Hryciuk

reviews.title: Junk
reviews.comment: Doesn\'t work on latest Jellybean. Just hangs on the startup screen.
reviews.author: Brendan Dillon
